en.title: Super-Fast M2M Payments Are Finally a Blockchain Reality

post.content:
## Super-Fast M2M Payments Are Finally a Blockchain Reality
**MXC Foundation releases M2M Payment Mechanism for Machine-to-Machine Payments**

The MXC Foundation, widely known for its integrated Blockchain partnerships with the Chinese government in [Shanghai](https://technode.com/2019/03/11/shanghai-partners-with-mxc-foundation-to-improve-smart-city-technology/) as well as China’s version of Amazon, “[JD.com](https://www.prweb.com/releases/jd_chooses_mxc_to_connect_their_logistics_tracking_with_blockchain/prweb16216844.htm)”, released today the [M2M Payments Mechanism](https://github.com/mxc-foundation), a revolutionary way to automate payments between machines. The M2M Payment Mechanism cleverly enables devices to autonomously process financial transactions within seconds, providing a state-of-the-art device payment mechanism and laying the foundation for automated payments between wireless devices.

“At MXC we’re building a world where literally anyone is able to financially benefit from data, providing Smart City Networks and Device Data connectivity, we’re standing on the verge of the next global data movement,” said Aaron Wagener, co-founder of the MXC Foundation. “This M2M Payment Mechanism is the first step towards building the world’s fastest IoT blockchain machine payment platform.”

The M2M Payments Mechanism allows for rapid transactions between devices. This makes it possible for a wireless sensor to autonomously pay for network access without requiring oversight or authorization from the company owning it. If it has data to send, it will pay for the access needed to send this data. 

As part of the mechanism, device owners will have the option to subscribe various [LPWAN](https://blog.mxc.org/benefits-limitations-lpwan) sensors to third-party LPWAN Gateways. This creates a whole new level of mobility among LoRaWAN sensors while providing multiple failover options to ensure the steady and reliable transmission of the collected data.

Corporate partners also benefit from the MXC M2M Payments Mechanism. Part of this software release adds the tools needed for corporate adoption of the [MXProtocol](https://blog.mxc.org/mxprotocol-explained-mxc/); including transaction history, low balance warnings, device subscription management and the ability to generate invoices.
MXC’s M2M Payments Mechanism integrates flawlessly with the AXS Wallet, providing a single dashboard from which to manage both MXC and MXC earnings from MXProtocol enabled LPWAN devices, providing a mechanism to profit from the devices of this world. Anyone wishing to contribute to, or view the code behind MXC M2M Payments Mechanism can find it in the open-source [MXC Foundation GitHub repository](https://github.com/mxc-foundation).
post.metaDescription: MXC released the M2M Payment Mechanism for M2M payments, creating the first autonomous blockchain connected payment system for wireless devices.

post.slug: 高速的m2m支付终于在区块链中成真了
快速的m2m支付終於在區塊鏈中成真了

hans.title: 快速的M2M支付终于在区块链中成真了

post.content:
## 快速的M2M支付终于在区块链中成真了

**MXC极域基金会发布给予机器到机器支付的M2M支付机制**

MXC极域基金会因为与[上海](https://technode.com/2019/03/11/shanghai-partners-with-mxc-foundation-to-improve-smart-city-technology/)中国政府的落地应用区块链，以及中国版亚马逊 [“京东云“](https://www.prweb.com/releases/jd_chooses_mxc_to_connect_their_logistics_tracking_with_blockchain/prweb16216844.htm)的合作伙伴关系而广为人知，今天发布了[M2M支付机制](https://github.com/mxc-foundation)，这是一种在机器之间实现自动付款的革命性方式。M2M支付机制巧妙地使设备能够在几秒钟内自动处理金融交易、提供最先进的设备支付机制，并为无线设备之间的自动支付奠定基础。

MXC极域基金会的创始人Aaron Wagener说到：”在MXC极域，我们正在构建一个世界是任何人都能从数据上获得财务的收益、提供智慧城市网路和设备数据的连接，我们正处于下一次全球数据运动的边缘，” “这个M2M支付机制，是构建世界上最快的物联网区块链机器支付平台的第一步。”

M2M支付机制允许设备之间的快速交易。 这使得无线感应器可以自动地为使用网路付费而无需透过拥有感应器的公司做监督或授权。 如果有数据要发送，将需支付发送此数据所需的使用权限。

作为该机制的一部分，设备拥有者可以选择订阅各种LPWAN感应器到第三方LPWAN的闸道器。 这在LoRaWAN感应器之间创造了全新的移动性，同时提供多种故障转移选项，以确保收集数据的稳定性并是可靠地传输。

企业合作伙伴也受益于MXC极域的M2M支付机制。 该软体版本的一部分增加了一些企业采用MXC极域协议所需的工具; 包括交易历史记录、低余额警告、设备订阅管理以及产生发票的功能。
MXC极域的M2M支付机制与AXS钱包完美集成、提供单一的仪表板，是从MXC极域协议支持的LPWAN设备管理中的MXC极域和MXC极域收益，来提供从这个世界的设备中获利的机制。 任何希望参与或了解MXC极域的M2M支付机制背后代码的人，都可以在开源的[MXC极域基金会GitHub贮藏库](https://github.com/mxc-foundation)中找到它。
post.metaDescription: MXC极域基金会因为与上海中国政府的落地应用区块链，以及中国版亚马逊 “京东云“的合作伙伴关系而广为人知，今天发布了M2M支付机制，这是一种在机器之间实现自动付款的革命性方式。
post.slug: 高速的m2m支付终于在区块链中成真了
